bug.author: lukeyeager
bug.summary: Torch branch can't display jobs from master branch
bug.description:
When I get the torch branch and try to look at a job trained with caffe on the master branch, I get this error: BuildError ('serve_file', {}, None) ... File "/home/lyeager/digits/digits/templates/models/images/classification/show.html", line 30, in block "job_content"
{{task.log_file}}
...
